thread.title_full: From The Vault - When Anil Kumble Fired 7 Lethal Shots To Destroy Pakistan In Kolkata - Indiatimes.com

title: From The Vault - When Anil Kumble Fired 7 Lethal Shots To Destroy Pakistan In Kolkata - Indiatimes.com
text:
Somak Adhikari February 01, 2017 
If Sachin Tendulkar was the mainstay of India's batting then Anil Kumble was the vital cog of their bowling department. 
The man has bowled us to victory many times and on occasions been the sole threat to the opposition. 
AFP 
Such was the case on March 20, 2005. India had set Pakistan 422 to win in the 2nd Test at Eden Gardens and the leg-spinner was in a mood to scalp up some victims. 
The Kolkata crowd was no stranger to Kumble's heroics. Back in 1993, he had taken 6/12 against West Indies in the Hero Cup final at the same venue. 
Now it was time to enthrall them again. Having removed Shahid Afridi late on Day 4, the final day was the Kumble show as he literally ran through the side. 
AFP 
The likes of Younis Khan and Inzamam-ul Haq were no match was for his flight and guile as Pakistan fell apart like a house of cards. 
Kumble finished with 7/63 and the visitors were sent packing for 226. India won by 195 runs to lead the series 1-0. 
What made this performance truly special was that it came against our traditional rivals and took place at an iconic stadium. Don't Miss
